title: Forever
description: A responsive full-stack e-commerce application featuring secure user authentication, shopping cart management, and payment gateway integration. Built for a smooth and scalable online shopping experience.

title: StegGuard
description: An AI-powered steganography detection tool that uses RGB histogram analysis and a Random Forest Classifier to uncover hidden content in images. Includes a Tkinter-based GUI for instant image upload and prediction.

title: HUJ Movies
description: A Flask-based movie management and recommendation site using the TMDb API for rich data, PostgreSQL for storage, and scikit-learn for personalized suggestions, with a responsive HTML/CSS interface.
